sitting

Class SingleResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • sitting.SingleResult
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DistractorResult, WordResult

    public class SingleResult
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represent a single result made by a participant. It contains the time it took to answer a single question , the answer he gave and the correct answer.
    Author:
    Philippe de SÃ¨ve , Jean-Etienne Salois
